title: [Cancer] A Decade On, the First CAR-T Immunotherapy Patients Are Declared "Cured": A follow-up study examining two of the first leukemia patients to be given CAR-T immunotherapy 10 years ago has shown they remain free of cancer cells, and that their transplanted T cells remain able to fight cancer ex-vivo
[Health] Scientists unveil promising new approach to diabetes prevention Experimental compound protects obese mice from diabetes-like metabolic changes
